name: Red Superhot Time Shoot 3D
description:
Welcome to the new part – spin-off - of the famous slow-mo action!
The world is filled with red and white colors. These colors run through existence and, by refraction, creating strange creatures from glass, waging war at this place.
Become one of such aggressive red creatures – but the very special one! You have the power of time control! Stop time to avoid bullets, control its trajectories to get in target and have fun with Red Superhot Time Shooter 3D game!
These strange human-like creatures made from something looking like red glass trying to kill and your only advantage is your time control ability! Shoot and cut them before they did it with your and enjoy the specific atmosphere of time-control action hame!
Use all your skills, try different weapons, explore huge levels and complete deadly missions! Try two different game modes – single mode and endless mode and do your best to get the highest results in both! Earn points and check new weapons! and feel very hot with Red Superhot Time Shooter 3D!
Superhot Time Shooter 3D features:
• Another part of famous slo-mo action game series
• All-new weapons and locations
• New time control mechanics
• Two different game modes
Use all your shooting and fighting skills, to destroy all crystalline creatures and rule this strange place!
